account.create.description: Siga as instruções para criar uma conta para o Pinbox
account.create.qrcode_explanation: During this step, a secure random passphrase for your account is being generated. When you click the Stop button an unique passphrase is shown, or you can re-generate a new one
account.details.description: This is your Burst Account, which is related to Pinbox
account.details.title: Account Details
account.details.reset_explanation: By resetting Pinbox, you remove your account information and further local data. You won't delete your pinned files. These can always be restored.
account.finish.summary: Congratulations. Your account is set up
account.info.burst_accountId: Id de conta da Carteira Burstcoin
account.info.has_secured: Yes, I wrote down/printed the account information and stored securely
account.info.private_section: The information in this section are private and must not be passed to others
account.info.public_section: The information in this section are public and can be passed to others
account.info.secure_information: It's important that you keep the private information in a safe place. We recommend to save the certificate as PDF using the print function, and store it in a password store tool, like KeePass
account.pin.explanation: The PIN is an alphanumeric value, that you can remember easily. It is needed to confirm your transactions/payments. In contrast to the passphrase the PIN can be changed or even recreated.
account.set.description: Follow the instructions to setup Pinbox with your existing Burst account
account.set.passphrase_description: Enter your secret Passphrase to identify your existing account. Of course, the passphrase won't be saved and/or sent to anybody.
account.set.verify_account.your_address_: O endereço da sua conta é
account.state.active.description: Your account is activated and fully secured
account.state.inactive.description: Your account has no public key yet. To fully secure your account you should execute a transaction
account.state.notfound.description: Your account was not found in the blockchain. Are you really sure using that account?
dropbox.drop_here: Drag and drop your files or folders in this area
login.description: If you have a Burst account already you can enter with your existing account. Otherwise, you may create a new one.
login.title: Login
pools.table.subtitle: A Pool manages the distribution of files for the decentralized network. Each Pool has slightly different characteristics like pricing, amount of connected nodes, etc. To use Pinbox you need to select exactly one Pool.
pools.table.title: Escolha um polo
